languages.text: Вольный Торговец велел{mf||а} изучать Процедуру 0-Х. Многие соблазняются древними знаниями и вступают на путь греховного творчества, чем вызывают гнев праведников.
The Rogue Trader ordered that Procedure 0-C be studied. Many are tempted by the ancient knowledge and set out on the path of sacrilegious creation, incurring the fury of devout adherents.
languages.original_text: Вольный Торговец велел{mf||а} изучать Процедуру 0-Х. Многие соблазняются древними знаниями и вступают на путь греховного творчества, чем вызывают гнев праведников.

traits.locale_text: The Rogue Trader ordered to have Procedure 0-Х studied. Many are tempted by the ancient knowledge and set out on the path of sacrilegious creation, incurring the fury of devout adherents.

The Rogue Trader ordered that Procedure 0-C be studied. Many are tempted by the ancient knowledge and set out on the path of sacrilegious creation, incurring the fury of devout adherents.

The Rogue Trader ordered that Procedure 0-C be studied. Many are tempted by the ancient knowledge and set out on the path of sacrilegious creation, incurring the fury of devout adherents.

languages.text: {mf|Le libre-marchand|La libre-marchande} a donné l'ordre d'étudier la procédure 0-C. Tentés par les connaissances anciennes, beaucoup se sont engagés sur la voie de la création sacrilège, ce qui a suscité la fureur des fervents adeptes.
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader ordered that Procedure 0-C be studied. Many are tempted by the ancient knowledge and set out on the path of sacrilegious creation, incurring the fury of devout adherents.

traits.locale_text: {mf|Le libre-marchand|La libre-marchande} a donné l'ordre d'étudier la procédure 0-Х. Tentés par les connaissances anciennes, beaucoup se sont engagés sur la voie de la création sacrilège, ce qui a suscité la fureur des fervents adeptes.

languages.text: 自由開拓者はプロシージャー0-Cの研究を命じた。多くの者が古代の知識に誘惑され、冒涜的な創造の道を歩み始め、敬虔な信奉者の怒りを買った。
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader ordered to have Procedure 0-C studied. Many are tempted by the ancient knowledge and set out on the path of sacrilegious creation, incurring the fury of devout adherents.

traits.locale_text: 自由開拓者はプロシージャー0-Хの研究を命じた。多くの者が古代の知識に誘惑され、冒涜的な創造の道を歩み始め、敬虔な信奉者の怒りを買った。

languages.text: 行商浪人命令对0-C程序开展研究。许多人受到远古知识的诱惑，走上了亵渎的创造之路，这激起了虔诚教徒的愤怒。
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader ordered that Procedure 0-C be studied. Many are tempted by the ancient knowledge and set out on the path of sacrilegious creation, incurring the fury of devout adherents.

traits.locale_text: 行商浪人命令对0-C程序开展研究。许多人受到远古知识的诱惑，走上了亵渎的创造之路，这激起了虔诚教徒的愤怒。

languages.text: {mf|El|La} Comerciante Independiente ordenó que se estudiara el Procedimiento 0-C. Muchos se ven tentados por el antiguo conocimiento y emprenden el camino de la creación sacrílega, provocando la furia de los devotos seguidores.
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader ordered to have Procedure 0-C studied. Many are tempted by the ancient knowledge and set out on the path of sacrilegious creation, incurring the fury of devout adherents.

traits.locale_text: {mf|El|La} Comerciante Independiente ordenó que se estudiara el Procedimiento 0-X. Muchos se ven tentados por el antiguo conocimiento y emprenden el camino de la creación sacrílega, provocando la furia de los devotos seguidores.

languages.text: {mf|Der Freihändler|Die Freihändlerin} hat befohlen, Prozedur 0-C zu erforschen. Viele werden von dem antiken Wissen in Versuchung geführt und begeben sich auf den Pfad der frevlerischen Schöpfung, wodurch sie den Zorn frommer Gläubiger auf sich ziehen.
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader ordered that Procedure 0-C be studied. Many are tempted by the ancient knowledge and set out on the path of sacrilegious creation, incurring the fury of devout adherents.

traits.locale_text: {mf|Der Freihändler|Die Freihändlerin} hat befohlen, Prozedur 0-X zu erforschen. Viele werden von dem antiken Wissen in Versuchung geführt und begeben sich auf den Pfad der frevlerischen Schöpfung, wodurch sie den Zorn frommer Gläubiger auf sich ziehen.
